title: France panorama. [No. 70/18]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. Osaka-70 - the World Fair in Osaka focusing mainly on the French Pavillion. 2. Brest et Saint-Nazaire - the rebuilt port and city of Brest after almost complete destruction during WWII. Focuses mainly on the ship building industry and the university.
